author: alja
body:
Fireworks/FWInterface: 
Optimize FF TrackingParticle with hits proxy builder
Fix potential crash -- add check for collection in FF Tracks proxy builder 

Fireworks/Core:
Hide FullFramework proxy builders -- the condition is  FF proxy builder class name ends with FullFramework. Therefore the existing proxy builders are named TrackingParticleProxyBuilderFullFramework and TracksProxyBuilderFullFramework.
title: 7_0_X improvements in TrackingParticle visualization, hide FF proxy builder from cmsShow AddCollection dialog
